channel.title: ORR 508 vs PSC 508
channel.description:
Ok, i have one simple question, and i may be flamed, and told to go to moparisthebest.com/smf for asking it... Oh well. I want to know, what is the difference between a Official Runescape Release of the 508 Client, and a Private Server Compatible 508? I can't see any major difference except for the fact the the PSC 508 has some stuff renamed(CLass 82.java = Login.java, Class111.java = PacketParser.java, etc.). That's the only difference i can tell. some of the methods are renamed, and that's about it. Signlink, is just the Class68_Sub 13_Sub10 or whatever it is. Here's what happens:
My non-renamed 508 client: Private Servers: Stuck at "Connecting to update server" Official Runescape Servers(world63.runescape.com, etc): Connects with no problems
Renamed 508 client: Private Servers: Connects with no problems Official Runescape Servers: "Bad session ID".
so what's the problem?

item.title: ORR 508 vs PSC 508
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“Repentless, post:1, topic:235846”][quote author=Cheese_Police link=topic=300738.msg2481465#msg2481465 date=1223573909]

i thought this was going to be an intelligent, interesting question…

Hold your smart ass tongue in this kind of thread unless you have some useful input that will help people who are trying to learn. If you want an intelligent, interesting question, ask yourself how you can whine about ignorance yet refuse to help eradicate it.

please, don’t speak
[/quote]

Just speaking my mind. It gets annoying seeing people flame or talk down to people asking questions. It’s not like he was here asking how to work moparscape or something.[/quote]
It gets even more annoying that you post that kind of things 1.5 months later.

Read full topic

But the main question was what is the difference between a newly deobbed 508, and a 508 that has specific classes renamed? is it just the names of some classes are different, or is there something in one of the classes i must change in order to connect to different servers?[/quote]He was being sarcastic.
